div.p:
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio xix die Aprilis anno
quosupra

The samyn day the consal present for the tyme ordanit
the aldirman to ger al the poyntis of the tone kepe
the mesour' in fulnes of ane poynt of philp of
Dunbrekis present to him In Jugement and mett

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio vicesimo p die
aprilis Anno quo supra

The samyn day Williame blinsele forspekar to margaret Kintor
and Androw branchez procuratouris producit ane procuratory vndir the
saide androwis sele quhilkis beand' rede the saide aldirman
and balyeis askit at the saide Jonhne colisone forspekar'
to Alexander nachty gif he wald obiek or hed' ony thinge
to propone agane the saide procuratory

The saide day it was deliuerit be ane suorne assis'
Alexander chamer forspekar' that Alexander nachty sale keip and fulfill
ale the pontis contenit in his obligacion' maid' to Androw branche

div.head: Nomina assise ad Inquisicionem mariote Knollis
div.p:
Alexander Iruyne de Drum Alexander chamer de murchile Johannes culane
Thomas prat Andreas murray senior Dauid mathesone Dauid
mar' Alexander gray Alexander angousone Willelmus nicholsone henricus
hourum Johannes litstar Andreas murray Junior thomas rolland' Willelmus
gareache senior et marcus Stot burgenses dicti burgi Jurati
dicunt quod quondam Johannes Knollis auus mariote Knollis latricis
presencium obiit vltra vestitus et sasitus ut de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini
nostri Regis de vno annuo Redditu xiiij s' de terra Alexandri logy Jacente
infra dictum burgum in vico furcarum ex occidentali parte eiusdem vici inter terram
Roberti blinsel ex australi et terram Willelmi buchan ex boreali Et de vno
alio annuo Redditu sex s' et octo d' de terra antedicta Willelmi buchan in
eodem vico inter terram dicti Alexandri logy ex australi et terram Johannis lun
doris ex boriali Et de vno annuo Redditu x s' de quadam terra
vasta Roberti blinsel Jacente in eodem vico inter terram dicti Alexandri
logy ex boriali et aliam terram constructam prefati Roberti ex australi
et communiones vias Regias versus oriens et occidens Et quod dicta
mariota est vna de legittimis-is overwrites -a. et propinquioribus heredibus quondam dicti Johannis
auj sui de predictis annuis Redditibus cum pertinenciis Et quod est legittime
etatis Et quod tenentur in capite de Suppremo domino nostro
Rege per seruicium burgagium Et nunc existunt'unt' changed from 'it'. in manibus domini nostri
Regis per duos menses cum dimidio aut eocirca in defectu veri
heredis Jus suum minime prosequentis

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxij die
mensis aprilis anno quo supra

The saide day the borghe and recovntour befor immediatlie writin was
continevit be the balye for waknes of the courtis with consent and avis' of the
personis of consal present for the tyme to this day xv dais that day to haue
ane decisione of law in sic strintht forme and effect as now but preiudice
tile ony party

The saide day it was deliuerit be ane assis' thomas mar forspekar
that William anfrasone sal pay for the writing diting and ridschip of the
chartiris and evidencis maid' to Androw anfrasone' his brothir now of the late
of the Interes' to his landis Ande als' the said' Androw sal pay
xij d' to the redeming of Androw peterkynnis pundis for the annuele
Ande the said Williame anfrasone sal content and pay the
remanent of the annuellis to the frethin of the pundis of
the said' Androw peterkin

The said day Comperit Dauid Kintor and mariory Scrogis
his spous and askit iustice to be minsterit to thame anent
ane land liand' in the vuirkirkgate And protestit for Remed'
of law becaus' the aldirman and ballieis was rysinge

The samyn day comperit Dauid mar' eftir the protestacione maide
be the said Dauid' and his spous' Ande offerit him redy in
the behalf of the said Elizabeth' chamer to vndirly and do that
accordit hir to do Anent the Josin of the saide lande or ony
clame that thai hed' or mycht haue to obiek agan hir
coniunctfeftment protestand' that nay thinge said nor done be
thame suld' turne hir to ony preiudice anent hir said
coniunctfeftment

The saide day mastir Alexander fif forspekar to Jonhne of lammyntone
schew that the saide Jonhne denyit the ak maid' apon him and
margaret fechat one the law day last bigan anent the clame of
xxiij s' of annuele Rentis Ande that he consentit nocht tharto
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio xxiij die aprilis anno quo supra

The samyn day James Colisone become Souerte to kepe
Androw mureson skathles of xxxtj s' Scottis for James martin balye
of Disert Ande Jonhne betsone burges of Disert oblist him
be his hand' to keip the saide James Colison skathles tharanent

The samyn day Androw fif procuratour to Jonhne blak
yongar grantit him resauit fra thomas narne x s' and ix d'
and dischargit the saide thomas tharof and of al clamys betuix
thame

Be it kend tile ale mene be thir present lettres ws aldirmane ballies
consale and communite of the burgh' of Abirdene tile haue granttit sett and to maile
lattin ande be the tenour of thar lettrez Settis and to maile lattis tile our belouit
nychtbur Robert of Kintor sone ande ayr tile vmquhile Richert of Kintor
burges of the saide burgh' ale ande haile ane auchtande part of the fisching'
of the Crois one the wattir of Done or ale the termes of our next generale
assedacion' to be maid be the commissione of toune becaus' of the renunciacion'
ande owgevin of his rycht that he had or mycht haue in or to ony tak of the last
generale assedacion' and of his rycht as assignay tile his modyr eftir his deces'
of half ane netht of the wattir of Done Ande als'sua becaus' It was fundin
that the saide Robert hed ne rycht tile ane auchtand' part of the saide fisching'
of the Crois clamit be him be virteu of this instant generale assedacion' last
maide Tile hald and tile haue the said' auchtand' part of the Crois tile the
said' Robert his ayris and assignez' burgez' and induellaris within the burgh' of Abirdene
for ale the termes of the next generale assedacion' to be maid as said' Is
Entrand' in and with the said fisching in the vigile of Sancte Androw in
the yer' of god jM iiijC nynty eftir the ische of this last generale assedacion'
to the said' terme Indurand' with ale fredomes comoditeis profitis and rycht wys'
pertinence pertenand' or may pertene to the said' fischinge The said' Robert
his ayris and assignez' payand' yerly tile ws and our successouris siclik
maile and gressome as nychtbur and vthiris payis for siclik tak eftir the tenour
forme and effece of the next generale assedacion' to be maide indurand' the termes
of the samyn Ande we the forsaidis aldirman ballies Consall and communite bindis
and oblis' ws our successouris to varand' and defend' the said' fisching of the
Crois to the said' Robert his ayris and assignez' in maner and forme as said' Is be ale
our' gudis present and to haid agannis ale deidly In witnes of the quhilk thing to thir
present lettres we haue appensit our comone Sele at Abirdene the xxvj day of
februar' the yer' of god jM iiijC lxxx and thre yeris

Be it kend tile ale men be thar present lettres ws Aldirmane ballies Consale
and communite of Abirdene tile haue resauit be the handis of our trast nychtbur'
sere Johne' ruthirfurd of tarlane knycht fule contentacion' and payment of the maile of
his half ane nethis fischingis of the Raik one the wattir of Dee for the
termes of fywe yeris Inmediatly to be runnyn and complett eftir this instant
fisching' be done for the fyfty merkis aucht tile hym be ws as in the decret
of the lordis of Consale gevin tharapone proportis Off the quhilkis fywe yeris
maile we halde ws weile content and payit and dischargis and quiet'clamys
the saide knycht his ayris executouris ande assignez' for ws and our Successouris
and ale vthiris quhome It efferis now and for euire be thir puntis To the
quhilkis we haue maid our Comone Seile be appensit at the saide burgh'
the fyftene day of Aprile The yer' of god ane thousande four hundrecht
nynty and thre yeris

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxvij die aprilis
Anno quo supra

the samyn day it was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' Jonhne
Colisone forspekar that murthow blak is avand' tua full
of caldronnis to Canny atkin quhilkis the balyeis chargit
him to pay within terme of law

The saide day Jonhne litstar grantit him avand' to Jonhne
andirsone viij li' xj s' and viij d' vsual money of Scotland'
of the rest of ane pip of wad' quhilkis the balyeis chargit
him to pay within terme of law

Eodem die Johannes gray fecit coniunctim et diuisim Alexandrum gray et
Willelmum blinsel suos procuratores legittimos ad petendum exigendum et
recipiendum

The samyn day It was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' Dauid
mar forspekar that medy heruy sal content and pay to Jonhne
goslyne xvj s' be the fest of Sanct Jonhne callit myd
sommir next to cum

The said day Jonhne colisone follouit patrik wys' for xij barrelis
of beir and for fiwe yeris male of ane berne quhilkis he denyit
and it was putt to the decisione of ane assis' quhilkis riplie
avisit deliuerit be the moutht of Dauid mar that the said' patrik
restis avand' to him xx s' to be pait within terme of
law

the samyn day it was ordanit be ane suorne assis' that Alexander
chamer in the schipraw and Androw his sone sal pay demi li' wax to
the haly blud licht for the Amendis of the strubulance done to Wille
gregory
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene octauo die maij Anno quo supra

Eodem die comparuit Alexander glastir olim dominus de glak qui non vi aut
metu ductus nec errore lapsus seu aliquo dolo vel fraude circumuen
tus sed sua mera et pura voluntate sana et digesta mente ut
apperuit omnes et Singulos contractus Initos factos et appunctuatos
inter ipsum et Johannem gordone de lunger Et presertim vendiciones
alienaciones ac sasinarum tradiciones terrarum de lunger et hilton'
infra vicecomitatum de Kincardin Ac terrarum de Crommy litill warthile
duorum bonorum de harlaw et terrarum de glak infra vicecomitatum de Abirdene Nec
non vniuersas et singulas cartas sasinarum litteras Instrumenta obligaciones
et euiden' quascumque eidem Johanni desuper confect' approbavit racificauit et
confirmavit pro se et heredibus suis Imperpetuum Infra magistrum corporale prestitit
Juratum expressatis Sacrosanctis dei evangeliis quod non fuit choactus nec
circumuentus dolo vel fraude ad premissa que numque reuocaret
seu reuocari procuraret clam uel palam quod si fecerit de iure viam
promissa approbat et ratificat tociens quociens prout in Instrumento inde
petito plenius continetur'
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem xvij die maij anno quo supra

The samyn day the aldirman chargit Johnhe menyeis thomas fyf and
Dauid prat thre of ballieis of the said' burghe' present in the consalhous'
to pas' to the Relict of Richerd of Kintor and William colp and askit
at thame girssomez and maile for ane nethis fischingis of Done as
vthiris pait for siclik takis

Eodem die Andreas Wyntone deuenit plegius quod Johannes mark erit
distringibile infra burgum antedictum prout alij comburgenses secundum formam Juris infra
annum et diem

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem vicesimo die maij anno
quo supra

The samyn day Williame of buchane was lauchfullie
callit and nocht comperit to ansuer to the borghe' Strekit apone him be
Jonhe blak in the handis of philp Dunbrek officiar' that he aw to lay
ane serplar of woll betuix him and him in quhat Schip that ples' the
saide schip Jonhne custum fre siclik as he dide tile him in wictale
onys schipe weyand' alsmekile tharfor the ballieis chargit the said offi
ciar to pas' and tak ane distres' of the said' Williamis and latt it to borghe
gif It be askit and warne him to this day xv dais as the secunde day
of proces'

Eodem die Willelmus Wormet conuictus per assisam pro perturbio
Willelmi colp cuj emendabit ut Jura volunt EtThere is a small hole in the page between 'Et' and 'Dauid'. Dauid colp
amerciatur pro perturbio dicti Willelmj Wormet cuj emendabit vt
iura volunt Et quilibet ipsorum soluet dimidium libre cere ad lumen
Sancti sanguinis

the samyn day the aldirman and ballieis assignit friday that next cumis
to Androw Wentone and Williame gareauche to comper' befor tham
Ilkan to ansuer' tile vthiris anent the frauchtis and al vthir thingis that
athir of the saide partiis hede tile obiek and say tile vthiris as law
wile

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxiiij die maij
anno quo supra

the saide day Williame gareauche eldar was lauchfullie callit
and nocht comperit to ansuer' to the borghe Strekit apon him be androu
Wentone in the handis of philp Dunbrek for the wranguis' vp
takin fra Jonhe Damar' of mair' Siluer for j pokis of wollis
fraucht nor he suld' haue tane of resone eftir the tenor of the
chartir party Ande for the wnfulfilling of the deliuerance of ane
assis' anent the fraucht of the hulk as the ak maid tharapone
mair' fullely proportis tharfor the ballieis chargit the said officiar'
to pas' and tak ane Streis' of the said' Williamis and lat it agan
to borghe' gif it be askit Ande warne him to monunday
cum xv dais to comper befor thame to ansuer to the saide
borghe' as the Secunde day of proces'

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem vltimo die maij
anno quoThere is a small hole in the page between 'quo' and 'supra'.supra

the saide day Alexander Rede aldirman perofferit to William colp to mak
him peciabile to bruik and joys' half ane nethis fischingis of
the wattir of Done for this Instant yer' that he is in office he
payand' maile and grissome for the saide fischingis as vthiris nich
buris pais for siclik takis quhilkis half nethis fischinge the said Wil
yeame has brukit vndemandit Sene the vigile of Sanct Androw
Inmediate gangand' obefor to the xxviij day of maij instant'
quhill batht the termes of pament of the said' fischingis is bigan

The said' day it was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Jonhne'
Sthevinsone forspekar that Jonhne thomsone sclugy is awand' to
Jonhne thomsone iij li' Scottis money qu for borrougane
for Wilyeame philp quhilkis the ballieis chargit him to pay to
the procuratouris or factouris of the said' Jonhne within terme of law

The saide day the wyf of Williame philp grantit that Jonhne
thomsone sclugy salbe relewit and freid' of the thre li' Scottis
recouerit apon him be the factouris of Jonhne thomsone at the haym'
cumin of hir said' spous

The saide J day Jonet lundoris was conuikit for the strubulance of
Richerd' hile tharfor it was ordanit be the assis' gif euire scho
beis conuikit for strubulance of him or one vthiris in tyme to cum
scho sal pay xl s' vnforgevin to Sanct nicholes' werk

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem primo die Junij
anno quo supra

The saide day comperit Jonhne Davsone skippar of
my lorde of murrays schipe and follouit Adam brone Johne
fechat and Sandy teile to mak seruice in the saide Schip
for the viage quhilkis personis denyit that thai war' hirit to
mak seruice forthir nay to the port of abirdene Ande becaus'
thar was nay witnes that knew the condicion the saide skippar
referrit to the aithis of the saidez adam Jonhne and Alexander
quhilkis deponit the gret bodely aithe that thai war nocht
conducit hirit nor yet promittit to mak seruice farrar nay
nor to the port of Abirdene

Curia legalis balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in
pretorio eiusdem tercio die Junij anno quo supra

Eodem die Willelmus buchane legittime vocatus ad respondendum plegio super
ipsum porrecto per Johannem blak quod tenetur inponere vnum sarplarium
lane inter ipsos in naui sibi placen' prout in acto precedenti laus
continetur non comparuit Igitur precipitur philippo Dunbrek seriando capere district'
ab eo et premunire eum hodie ad quindenam ad respondendum dicto
plegio tanquam 3o die huius processus

the samyn day the ballieis ordanit Jonhne malisone to content
and pay to Jonet Smitht xxvj s' within xl dais hereftir
Ande Scho to putt him in lauchfule Sesin of ane pece
of land' liand' besid' his land in the nethir kirk gate Ande falye
and' tharof Scho to dispone apone hir avne land'

The saide day it was deliuerit be ane assis' Dauid mar
forspekar that Dauid Duffous' wrangit in the occupeinge off
of ane chamyr pertening to Jonhne moyses atour the terme Ande
atour thai ordanit the saide Jonhne to mak the saide hous' sufficient
within tene dais Ande the said Dauid to be dischargit of the male
of the saide chamer and it be nocht mendit sufficientlie within the
terme forsaid' Ande the saide Dauid to haue licence to sett the
saide chamer for this yer' be the avys' of Dauid mar and Dauid
theman

The samyn day the aldirman and ballieis ordanit the flessaris to tak
ale Cattall Scheip nolt and hors' beand' within the tone pertening
to vnfre folkis and putt tham in the fleshous quhile thai be
freid' be thame

Eodem die Andreas anfrasone fecit constituit ordinavit et nominavit Andream
murray seniorem et Jonetam hay suos legittimos procuratores in omnibus actionibus
ipsum concernentibus aut pertinere valentibus ad agendum prosequendum defendendum
Ac cum potestate ad perden Judicio cisti et Judicant soluere Ac cum omnibus
clausulis et terminis ad procuratorium legittimum necessariis et oportunis promitten' de Rato
et grato in vberiore forma procuratorij

the first day of June it was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Jonhne
Colisone forspekar that androu murray yongar is avand' to dene nichole
Sclugy xiij li' and xij s' Scottis money and xiij s' and iiij d' gif he
sueris nocht within the tolbutht one monunday that next cumis that the
said' xiij s' and iiij d' that is allouit obefor in the said' Some Ande
the said' dene nichole allowand' tua li' g' in the said' dene nichole
in Scottis money to be pait siclik and eftir the Ryte and forme that the
said Androw takis fra the said' dene nicholl for his ij li' g'
